comments.author: woez
comments.body: Maybe you are talking about Bitcoin? This was the first cryptocurrency ever created. This is a payment platform, which allows users to buy, sell and trade goods and services without using traditional payment methods like bank transfers or credit cards. In this way it is similar to PayPal or any other online payment platform, but with one big advantage: Bitcoin has a fixed supply of 21 million coins, so it can't be debased as PayPal's dollar reserves can be. And also, it is decentralised (nobody controls it), hence anonymity if you don't need physical addresses associated with your transactions.
